Package edu.cnm.deepdive.scalescroller.model.entity

Class Scale

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.scalescroller.model.entity.Scale
  • public class Scale
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds data in the database for available scales to be used. This includes enumerated types from the Note and Mode enums.
